diff_analysis.evidence: Old code expands cache_directory to an absolute normalized_cache_directory, but cache_path only checks that the normalized_path starts_with?(normalized_cache_directory) and then returns relative_path (which is undefined in the snippet). This broken/ineffective check can allow crafted paths to escape the intended cache directory, enabling path traversal (CWE-22). The new code removes this flawed normalization/validation logic and directly joins cache_directory with cache_file, eliminating the ineffective directory constraint logic present in the old code.
